task.title: Easter Baked Brunch Omelette
task.shortdesc: The following instructions will teach you how to make a delicious omelette very fit for an Easter breakfast!

ul.li: 1/2 (1 pound) loaf white bread, cut into cubes
1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste

context.p: This dish will require 1 hour and 15 minutes of your time.

step.cmd: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.
Place half of the bread cubes on bottom of baking pan. Sprinkle with half of the ham and then half of the cheese; repeat.
In a large bowl, beat together eggs, milk, salt, hot sauce and green onions. Pour egg mixture into pan.
Place pan on top of a baking sheet with a rim and place in oven. Pour water into baking sheet and bake for 60 minutes, or until eggs have set.
